entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 10:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -24.2°C
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -26.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
